scripts.uglify: for f in $(ls electron/web/*.js); do node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs $f -o $f --screw-ie8; done;
scripts.package: mkdir -p dist; npm run uglify; npm run win-icon; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='win32' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true --icon='./dist/win.ico'; npm run osx-icon; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='darwin' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true --icon='./dist/osx.icns'; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='linux' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true

scripts.package-osx: mkdir -p dist; npm run uglify; npm run osx-icon; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='darwin' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true --icon='./dist/osx.icns'
